text: The LORD wiped out every being on earth: human beings and animals, the crawling things and the birds of the air; all were wiped out from the earth. Only Noah and those with him in the ark were left.
Pharaoh turned away and went into his house, with no concern even for this.

The Israelites were called to arms from Naphtali, from Asher, and from all Manasseh, and they pursued Midian.

What other nation on earth is there like your people Israel? What god has ever led a nation, redeeming it as his people and making a name by great and awesome deeds, as you drove out the nations and their gods before your people, whom you redeemed for yourself from Egypt?
